metadata.description: A classic collection from Chris Claremont (Spider-Woman, Fantastic Four, Wolverine) and John Bolton (Books of Magic, Evil Dead: Army of Darkness). This thrilling mix of swordplay and mythological terror finds exiled knight James Dunrith - the Black Dragon - banished for necromancy and heresy. He returns home to find England in turmoil and is recruited by the beautiful Eleanor of Aquitaine to rally the powers of Nature against a ghastly tide of evil!
metadata.name: Black Dragon
